tr.td: Montclair wins toss and defers to second half. Salve to receive.
John Schubert kickoff 54 yards to the SRU11, Dan Buonocore return 27 yards to the SRU38 (Dan Barletta).
Steven Wilken pass complete to Dan Buonocore for 11 yards to the SRU49, 1ST DOWN SRU (Matt Mancino;Clario Sampson).
Steven Wilken rush for 5 yards to the MSU46 (Axhi Sakiri).
Richie Edwards rush for 1 yard to the MSU45 (Marc Aspinwall;John Gauweiler).
Steven Wilken pass incomplete to Trey Scales (Clario Sampson).
